EmailTemplate.name: 202001_Global_Channel Webinar_RDR7000.kcr.2.Invitation_Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Don't Miss Our RDR-7000 Dealer Webinar Next Week!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You Are Invited
To Our February Dealer Webinar Enable A More Comfortable & Safe Flight Join Technical Sales Manager, Steve Gomez, for our upcoming webinar, How Honeywell's IntuVue RDR-7000 Brings Advanced Weather Detection Capabilities to Business Aviation. Specifically for our Honeywell dealers, this webinar will address the typical shortcomings and lack of pilot proficiency found in old weather radar technology. After attending this webinar, you'll be well-versed on Honeywell's new weather radar technology found in the RDR-7000 and how RDR-7000 can improve your customers' understanding of weather around the aircraft, for a safer and more comfortable flight. DATE February 18, 2019 TIME 8:00am - 9:00am MST LOCATION Online and On-Demand HOSTED BY Steve Gomez
